mapper.sql: select st.id, st.member_id, st.stock_id, st.stock_name, st.stock_symbol, st.all_code, st.hold_id, st.date, st.time, st.trading_hand, st.trading_number, st.trading_price, st.trading_amount, st.trading_type, st.trading_poundage, st.stamp_duty, st.status, st.create_time, st.update_time, st.delete_flag, st.remark, m.id m_id, m.group_id m_group_id, m.username m_username, m.nickname m_nickname, m.password m_password, m.salt m_salt, m.salt_code m_salt_code, m.email m_email, m.mobile m_mobile, m.avatar m_avatar, m.level m_level, m.gender m_gender, m.bio m_bio, m.qq m_qq, m.money m_money, m.score m_score, m.successions m_successions, m.max_successions m_max_successions, m.prev_time m_prev_time, m.login_time m_login_time, m.login_ip m_login_ip, m.login_failure m_login_failure, m.login_failure_code m_login_failure_code, m.payment_code m_payment_code, m.join_ip m_join_ip, m.join_time m_join_time, m.create_time m_create_time, m.update_time m_update_time, m.token m_token, m.status m_status, m.verification m_verification, m.property_money m_property_money, m.balance m_balance, m.position_money m_position_money, m.freeze_money m_freeze_money, m.all_earnings_rate m_all_earnings_rate, m.transaction_num m_transaction_num, m.yesterday_profit m_yesterday_profit, m.city_value m_city_value, m.superior_name m_superior_name, m.superior_code m_superior_code, m.superior_id m_superior_id, m.institution_number m_institution_number, m.is_simulation m_is_simulation, m.position m_position, m.delay_money m_delay_money, m.sg_freeze_money m_sg_freeze_money, m.daili_id m_daili_id, m.jingzhijiaoyi m_jingzhijiaoyi, m.is_pz m_is_pz, m.is_dz m_is_dz, m.is_ps m_is_ps, m.is_sg m_is_sg, m.is_zs m_is_zs, m.is_qc m_is_qc, m.is_qh m_is_qh, m.is_inform m_is_inform, m.freeze_profit m_freeze_profit, m.zxyz m_zxyz, m.weiyima m_weiyima, m.name m_name, m.id_card m_id_card, m.auth_time m_auth_time, m.is_auth m_is_auth, m.auth_reject_reason m_auth_reject_reason, m.auth_reject_time m_auth_reject_time, m.deposit_bank m_deposit_bank, m.khzhihang m_khzhihang, m.account m_account, m.card_image m_card_image, m.is_default m_is_default, m.account_type m_account_type, m.binding_time m_binding_time, m.unbind_time m_unbind_time, m.delete_flag m_delete_flag from fa_stock_trading st left join fa_member m on st.member_id = m.id
mapper.insert:
insert into fa_stock_trading
member_id, stock_id, stock_name, stock_symbol, all_code, hold_id, date, time, trading_hand, trading_number, trading_price, trading_amount, trading_type, trading_poundage, stamp_duty, status, create_time, update_time, delete_flag, remark,
#{memberId}, #{stockId}, #{stockName}, #{stockSymbol}, #{allCode}, #{holdId}, #{date}, #{time}, #{tradingHand}, #{tradingNumber}, #{tradingPrice}, #{tradingAmount}, #{tradingType}, #{tradingPoundage}, #{stampDuty}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{deleteFlag}, #{remark},
mapper.delete: update fa_stock_trading set delete_flag = 1 where id = #{id}

update fa_stock_trading set delete_flag = 1 where id in
#{id}
